summary: This is an email chain from November 20, 2008, forwarding a draft response to a Florida Bar complaint. The sender mentions a judge continued a hearing until the next day and requests the attachment be converted to PDF and sent to a Hotmail account. The forwarded email discusses obtaining an extension to file the response and asks for review of the first few pages.

events.title: Judge continues hearing
events.description: A hearing was continued by a judge until the next day (November 21, 2008).

events.title: Deadline for Florida Bar complaint response
events.description: An extension was obtained for filing a response to a Florida Bar complaint, with the new due date being a week from Friday (approximately November 28, 2008).

keyFacts: An email from November 20, 2008, discusses a pending Florida Bar complaint and a draft response being prepared.
A judge continued a hearing until the next day (November 21, 2008).
An extension was obtained to file the response to the Florida Bar complaint, with a deadline approximately a week later.
The email attachment is titled 'Response_to_Florida_Bar_Complaint_v2.wpd', indicating it is a draft legal document.
The sender requests the attachment be converted to PDF and emailed to a Hotmail account, suggesting coordination outside official channels.
